column4: I was wondering if anybody could help me install Ubuntu Edgy on my HP Pavilion
When I try installing it, I get all sort of errors
The first one is
MP-BIOS bug 8254: Timer not connected to IO - APIC
I was able to get rid of that by adding noapic
to the installation intructions
but then I get ohci_hcd Found HC with no IRQ Check BIOS/PCI
BTW, it is a 64 bit machine
I am desperate to get rid of Windows
where did u get ur copy of ubuntu?
ubuntu.com
you will be guessing right
I run the CD check on it
It is actually a spanking new computer
I got my wife a laptop, so that I could get her Desktop
it is frustratring not being able to get rid of windows
on the new computer, they make a partition of the disk where they store the recovery information
I like HP computers because they have a pretty good CS, which is still on the US
nop, I am in the US, but they wont give me any support with regard to Linux
those sons of a gun
how much memory do u have?
1Gb
I thought it should be enough to at least get it going
